data.text:
Pula Airport, Pula, Croatia [ PUY / LDPL ]

If you are planning to travel to Pula or any other city in Croatia, this airport locator will be a very useful tool. This page gives complete information about the Pula Airport along with the airport location map, Time Zone, lattitude and longitude, Current time and date, hotels near the airport etc... Pula Airport Map showing the location of this airport in Croatia. Pula Airport IATA Code, ICAO Code, exchange rate etc... is also provided.

Pula Airport Info:

Pula Airport IATA Code: PUY Pula Airport ICAO Code: LDPL Latitude : 44.8974 Longitude : 13.9225 City : Pula Country : Croatia World Area Code : 415 Airport Type : Medium Pula Airport Address / Contact Details :

Pula Airport (PUY), Ližnjan, Croatia Pula Website : http://www.airport-pula.hr/ Airport Type : Public Operator : Pula Airport Ltd. Timezone : Europe/Zagreb Pula Airport Timezone : GMT +02:00 hours Current time and date at Pula Airport is 15:58:18 PM (CEST) on Thursday, Aug 15, 2024
